__e: All company units in Brazil have Internal Accident Prevention (CIPA) and Health and Safety Committees.

CIPA is the acronym for the Internal Commission for Accident Prevention, which aims to prevent accidents and illnesses related to work, seeking to reconcile work with the preservation of life and the promotion of the health of all workers.
